title: Second SAR satellite advances Space42’s hybrid connectivity and imagery vision
key_assets: ['Foresight-2 SAR satellite', 'AIT facilities in Abu Dhabi', 'LEO mission operations center in Abu Dhabi', 'SAR satellite manufacturing capabilities in UAE']
summary: Space42, a UAE-based satellite operator formed by the merger of Yahsat and Bayanat, has established communications with its second SAR satellite, Foresight-2, provided by Finnish operator ICEYE. The companies previously announced a partnership in 2023 for at least five LEO SAR satellites and a joint venture to build SAR satellites within the UAE. The collaboration aims to enhance Space42’s AI and SAR data analysis capabilities, supported by UAE sovereign wealth fund Mubadala.
why_it_matters: This partnership strengthens ICEYE’s market position by expanding its SAR constellation and establishing local manufacturing capabilities in the UAE. For Space42, it advances the UAE’s space technology ambitions, particularly in AI-driven geospatial analytics and hybrid connectivity, while diversifying its satellite portfolio beyond geostationary communications.
